What are the treatments for Childhood Brain Stem Glioma ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for children with brain stem glioma.     - Children with brain stem glioma should have their treatment planned by a team of health care providers who are experts in treating childhood brain tumors.    - Childhood brain stem gliomas may cause signs or symptoms that begin before the cancer is diagnosed and co
